reviewText: Great walk down memory lane. Growing up on a farm was the best life ever. Very well done. Arrived early.
I bought this for my 87 year old retired farmer dad! He loved it!! I could tell it took him right back to his childhood

We just received this CD and since it is a gift, I cannot say how the recipient will like it.  I saw the program on Public Television and believed my gifted would enjoy the story as well.  My personal rating of the story would be 5 star!
great short story give a listen and you will love it.
This is such a wonderful DVD.  Brings back lots of memories.
This nostalgic piece of Americana should be viewed by everyone!
Always amazing. He brings me back to my childhood on the farm. Be sure and also get the winter DVD.
More of what we did on our farm. The pictures were very timely. Great show!
Absolutely wonderful. I highly recommend Jerry Apps!

Raised on a small farm in southwestern Indiana, I could identify with many of the author's experiences. It is a gift to be able to embrace the positive as well as the negative experiences of one's childhood and realize the role they played in who we are today
Caught part of this show on public TV one night and decided to order the DVD. The DVD arrived in time and in great condition. Excellent watch,  be sure to check out Jerry Apps' books, too!
reminds me of some old times.

Pure delight, well done, informative, great to share with elder ones for the memories it brings to mind, and for grandkids who can get a chance to learn about the early years  of their grandparents/great grandparents.  Have shared it with many friends who have all really loved it.
